text: The Chang Zheng-1 rocket launched, carrying the first Chinese satellite, the Dong Fang Hong-1.
At a meeting called "Apple II Forever", Apple introduced the portable Apple IIc. The machine came with 128 kilobytes of RAM and a 5 1/4 inch floppy disk drive.
The Space Shuttle Discovery launched with the Hubble Space Telescope on board. The following day, Hubble was released into space.
